languages.text: "Мы знали, что сможем тебя понять! Свет и движение, связи и помощь. Нам нравится это. Может быть, потому, что мы тоже связаны с тобой? Через кровь. Через жизнь".
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
languages.original_text: "Мы знали, что сможем тебя понять! Свет и движение, связи и помощь. Нам нравится это. Может быть, потому, что мы тоже связаны с тобой? Через кровь. Через жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."
"We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

languages.text: « Nous savions que nous pouvions vous comprendre ! La lumière, le mouvement, les liens, l'aide... Nous aimons cela... peut-être parce que nous sommes, nous aussi, liés à vous par le sang, par la vie. »
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: « Nous savions que nous pouvions vous comprendre ! La lumière, le mouvement, les liens, l'aide... Nous aimons cela... peut-être parce que nous sommes, nous aussi, liés à vous par le sang, par la vie. »

languages.text: “我们知道我们能理解你！光明和行动，联系和帮助。我们很喜欢。或许是因为我们也和你有联系？通过血液，通过生命。”
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: “我们知道我们能理解你！光明和行动，联系和帮助。我们很喜欢。或许是因为我们也和你有联系？通过血液，通过生命。”

languages.text: "Wir wussten, wir können Euch verstehen! Licht und Bewegung, Verbindungen und Hilfe. Wir haben Freude daran. Vielleicht, weil auch wir mit Euch verbunden sind? Durch Blut. Durch Leben."
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wussten, wir können Euch verstehen! Licht und Bewegung, Verbindungen und Hilfe. Wir haben Freude daran. Vielleicht, weil auch wir mit Euch verbunden sind? Durch Blut. Durch Leben."

languages.text: «¡Sabíamos que lograríamos entenderte! Luz y movimiento, conexiones y ayuda. Lo estamos disfrutando. ¿Será porque también estamos conectados a ti? A través de la sangre. A través de la vida».
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sabíamos que lograríamos entenderte! Luz y movimiento, conexiones y ayuda. Lo estamos disfrutando. ¿Será porque también estamos conectados a ti? A través de la sangre. A través de la vida».

languages.text: 「やはりあなたを理解できた！光と動き、繋がりと救済。私たちは、これを楽しんでいる。私たちも血を、生命を通してあなたと繋がっているからだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: 「やはりあなたを理解できた！光と動き、繋がりと救済。私たちは、これを楽しんでいる。私たちも血を、生命を通してあなたと繋がっているからだろうか？」

languages.text: "Sizi anlayabileceğimizi biliyorduk! Işık ve hareket, bağlantılar ve yardım... Bundan keyif alıyoruz. Belki biz de kan yoluyla, yaşam yoluyla size bağlı olduğumuz içindir?"
languages.original_text: "We knew we could understand you! Light and movement, connections and help. We are enjoying this. Perhaps because we too are connected to you? Through blood. Through life."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi anlayabileceğimizi biliyorduk! Işık ve hareket, bağlantılar ve yardım... Bundan keyif alıyoruz. Belki biz de size bağlı olduğumuz içindir? Kan yoluyla... Yaşam yoluyla..."
